title: Tender for Supply of Measles, Mumps and Rubella Vaccine Live Attentuated -(Freeze Dried) MMR Vaccine 10 Dose Vial
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, to award the above tender as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
